articles.description: The latest images show a camouflaged test mule of the Mahindra Thar 5-door lifestyle SUV, albeit wearing production-ready alloy wheels.
articles.content: The difference in the alloy wheels is notable with Mahindra moving away from the multi-spoke units on the current Thar 3-door to what appears to be a diamond-cut design. The test unit also appears to… [+1284 chars]
